group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Ethics approval was obtained from the Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario Research Ethics Board (REB). Informed consent was obtained from all participants as required by the REB.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
